title: Civic Data Cooperative team introduction
lead: The Civic Data Cooperative (CDC) is a part of the Faculty of Health and Life Sciences at the University of Liverpool. We work on various projects that operate with data related to citizens helping to build a better region. When delivering our projects, we believe in a transparent, open approach following best practices. The CDC has access to various data, mainly related to healthcare, such as summary patient records or synthetic datasets.
content:
The Civic Data Cooperative (CDC) is a part of the Faculty of Health and Life Sciences at the University of Liverpool. We work on various projects that operate with data related to citizens helping to build a better region. When delivering our projects, we believe in a transparent, open approach following best practices. The CDC has access to various data, mainly related to healthcare, such as summary patient records or synthetic datasets.

We want to help people in Liverpool City Region.

The LCR CDC wants to cooperate with everyone engaged in public life, including GP practices, Liverpool health partners, research-interested clinicians, nurses, SMEs, and the general public. We want to join everyone's forces to improve life in the region.

LCR Civic Data Cooperative

The Liverpool City Region Civic Data Cooperative is a team working under the Faculty of Health and Life Sciences at the University of Liverpool. We were established in spring 2021.

We are working on various projects mainly focused on health-related data. Our primary mission is to make data about citizens work for citizens. The LCR CDC is a growing team composed of experts.
